name: Starquake
overview: It has been over 30 years since the classic game STARQUAKE was released on the ZX Spectrum and at long last Commodore Amiga owners have their very own version of the game! The Amiga conversion of Starquake is officially endorsed by Steve Crow and is based on the Atari ST version of the game. The Amiga version features extra enhancements including a new intro sequence featuring new presentation screens and enhanced music on the front-end.
